Subsection.title: Overview
Subsection.Paragraph: The validation process checks a number of properties of the underlying file model.

Subsection.title: Required Categories
Subsection.Paragraph: The validation process checks to see if the category requirements are satisfied for all images in the dataset. In pseudocode, the process is:

FormalItem.title: Required Categories (Pseudocode)

Subsection.Paragraph: Informally, for each image i, for each required category c, validation succeeds if at least one caption in c is assigned to i.
